name: Rattata
facts: Rattata can live almost anywhere and can survive on little food.

name: Raticate
facts: Raticate's fangs grow steadily and it gnaws on hard objects to keep them ground down.

name: Pidgey
facts: Pidgey has an outstanding sense of direction.

name: Pidgeotto
facts: Pidgeotto flies over its wide territory in search of prey.

name: Pidgeot
facts: Pidgeot's large wings allow it to fly at speeds close to Mach 2.

name: Meowth
facts: Meowth loves shiny objects and will wander the streets at night to find dropped loose change.

name: Persian
facts: Persian has a very sophisticated air. It does not keep a permanent den and prefers to roam freely.

name: Jigglypuff
facts: Jigglypuff's singing voice is known to put people and Pokémon to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
facts: Wigglytuff's fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.

name: Clefairy
facts: Clefairy is said to live in quiet, mountainous areas, where it dances under the full moon.

name: Clefable
facts: Clefable is very sensitive to sound and will flee when it hears something it doesn't like.

name: Snorlax
facts: Snorlax's typical day consists of nothing more than eating and sleeping.

name: Eevee
facts: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives.

name: Zubat
facts: Zubat avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy.

name: Golbat
facts: Golbat loves to drink the blood of living things. It is particularly active in the pitch black of night.

name: Psyduck
facts: Psyduck always holds its head due to its constant headache.

name: Golduck
facts: Golduck is often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Doduo
facts: Doduo's two heads never sleep at the same time. It can run faster than it can fly.

name: Dodrio
facts: Dodrio's three heads represent joy, sorrow, and anger. It races through grassy plains with powerful strides.

name: Farfetch’d
facts: Farfetch’d always carries a stalk from a plant. The stalk is used for building its nest.

name: Bidoof
facts: Bidoof is known to be constantly gnawing on logs and rocks to keep its teeth ground down.

name: Bibarel
facts: Bibarel is known for building dams. It works as part of a group to make structures out of branches and rocks.

name: Hoothoot
facts: Hoothoot has an internal organ that senses and tracks the earth's rotation, allowing it to always know the time.

name: Noctowl
facts: Noctowl is a powerful nighttime hunter. It catches its prey using its stealthy silent flight.

name: Rattata-Alola
facts: Rattata-Alola is nocturnal and hunts for food in packs led by Raticate-Alola.

name: Raticate-Alola
facts: Raticate-Alola is the boss of a group of Rattata-Alola. It has a taste for luxury foods.

name: Silicobra
facts: Silicobra's neck pouch can store sand, which it uses to blind its opponents.

name: Sandaconda
facts: Sandaconda's sand pouch is incredibly elastic, allowing it to store up to a ton of sand.
